text: Sean Stephane Martin (December 29, 1950 – August 3, 2020) was an American- Canadian cartoonist, illustrator, and graphic designer. He was best known for creating the long-running Doc and Raider comic strip which appeared in LGBT publications. Martin died of pancreatic cancer on August 3, 2020 at the age of 69.RIP – SEAN STEPHANE MARTIN ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:American cartoonists Category:American illustrators Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada
title: Sean Martin (cartoonist)
